body: Bunmi posts a link to a video of an hour long discussion with Nigerian fantasy-sci-fi writer Nnedi Okorafor: "Here she touches on race, paralysis and plant worlds."
original_body: Bunmi posts a link to a video of an hour long discussion with Nigerian fantasy-sci-fi writer Nnedi Okorafor: "Here she touches on race, paralysis and plant worlds."
title: Nigeria: Discussion with Nigerian fantasy-sci-fi writer
